key_themes: AI infrastructure and mega-cap tech momentum
Rate cut expectations and monetary policy tailwinds
Demand destruction and earnings guidance risk
Institutional crypto adoption vs security vulnerabilities
Year-end positioning dynamics masking fundamental weakness
risk_factors: Q4 earnings season guidance cuts revealing demand weakness
Heavy truck sales and consumer data signaling economic deterioration
Insider selling at board levels (NVIDIA $40M) indicating valuation concerns
Banking supervisory tightening and fintech earnings pressure
Crypto security vulnerabilities creating contagion risk
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY testing resistance at $700 Call Wall (146k OI) with support at Max Pain $684. QQQ facing $620 resistance (33k OI active) with $619 Max Pain gravitational pull. Early close Wednesday at 1 PM creates low-volume environment limiting directional conviction.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: $700 Call Wall major resistance, $684 Max Pain pivot, $650-$645 secondary support cluster if $684 breaks. QQQ: $640 Call Wall caps upside, $619 Max Pain central, $590 Put Wall major support (164k OI). Watch for breakdown below Max Pain levels signaling momentum shift into January earnings season.
